system.effect: Prerequisites: Minor Gift - Detect Heretic X AP - Standard Action Target: Trainer or Pok√©mon within 6 meters Effect: For each AP spent on Corrupt Existence up to  a maximum of 3, roll 1d20. The Target becomes one  step weaker against a Type for each roll as follows: Bug  on a result of 1; Dark on 2; Dragon on 3; Electric on 4;  Fighting on 5; Fire on 6; Flying on 7; Ghost on 8; Grass  on 9; Ground on 10; Ice on 11; Normal on 12; Poison  on 13; Psychic on 14; Rock on 15; Steel on 16; Water on  17; and on a result of 18-20, reroll the 1d20. This effect  lasts until the end of the encounter, even if the target is  recalled.
